name: enteral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving putting food substances or medicine into someone's digestive system (= the organs in the body where food is digested), rather than into the veins, for example: enteral nutrition Enteral nutrition is delivered into the digestive system as a liquid.enteral feeding The nurse administered an enteral feeding to a patient via a tube. enteral administration Enteral administration of the drug was not effective.
More examplesFewer examplesEnteral administration may be oral (by mouth), gastric (through the stomach), or rectal (from the rectum).The patient was treated with enteral feeds.These oral and enteral products have a high nutritional value. The use of enteral antibiotics did not cause any adverse events.The majority of the patients were on enteral feeding.
